Movie_Des: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Movie_Des: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

Movie_Des: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Movie_Des: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

Movie_Des: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
